infos.value: Help me... Warriors who bear the light...
This world will be consumed... Make haste before all is lost...
What is this place? I thought I heard a voice calling out to me...
Rain!
Fina! So you're here, too.
Yeah, but I don't really know what's going on. Where even are we?
No idea. I've never seen so much miasma in one place, though...
Something doesn't feel right.
Where...where am I? I tried to answer a call for help, and then...
I see we share the same fate, Mont. I, too, heard the call.
Machérie! You're here as well.
It is heartening that we are together...especially in a malignant land such as this.
Who are you guys? Where did you come from?
There are others here...!
Us, too! We were just here all of a sudden.
I see... I am Mont of Leonis. This is Machérie of Hourne.
Leonis...? Hourne?
...Can't say I've heard of those countries.
You do not know of our lands? Then where would you hail from?
Right, we haven't gotten around to introductions. I'm Rain, a knight of Grandshelt.
And I'm Fina. Nice to meet you.
Grandshelt... I know not of such a place.
I see. Then we might have been summoned here from different worlds...
Or maybe even from different times.
Did you both hear that voice asking for help?
We did. But to whom could it belong...?
I am the voice you speak of.
You're...the Will of Light!
Correct. Seeking your aid, I summoned you to this world as visions.
Visions...!? Do you mean to say Machérie and I are mere visions now?
Indeed. Your current forms are the embodiment of your desire to answer my call.
I see... Though this is somewhat different from the visions I know...
I never imagined I'd become one myself... It's a curious sensation.
Fina referred to you as the Will of Light... What manner of being are you?
I am one of the entities who maintain the balance of this world.
Light and darkness, love and hate, creation and destruction. All in the universe has an inverse, and I exist to ensure its harmony.
However...something currently threatens to consume this world and destroy its very balance.
At this rate, the world will meet with ineludible ruin.
Which is why you reached out for our help.
What could be the source of such a threat?
A pair of rampaging malboro.
If allowed to carry out their destruction, this world may not be the only one affected.
Others may also suffer the same fate, collapsing into disarray.
Oh, no... Are they really that dangerous?
If they are, we need to get rid of these malboro, and fast.
Agreed. If they will truly affect other worlds beyond this one, then that is all the more reason for us to stop them.
I thank you. Please...save this world.
Two malboro are the cause of this... Let us take the task in two groups—myself and Mont, Rain and Fina.
Sure. Call out for us if you find yourselves in danger!
Danger, you say...? Hmph. Mont may seem to lack the mettle at first glance, but he is a man with backbone.
M-Machérie...
Besides, it is I who accompanies him. You needn't worry for us. I suggest you focus on your own safety.
Hehe, you really believe in Mont, don't you? You're such a good team.
We won't get shown up, though! Will we, Rain?
You've got that right. Let's go deal with our malboro!
I pray for your safety and a swift victory. Now then, let us see this done.
